Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload
Deprecated: ShowHide
View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPlaylist
    The playlist represents a sequenced set of Assets that are to be consecutively downloaded.
    IPlaylistAssetProvider
    This interface provides a configurable mechanism to populate asset details when the Virtuoso engine creates new assets automatically using the auto download feature.
    IPlaylistConfig
    Defines the various configuration options that can be used to create a VirtuosoPlaylist.
    IPlaylistItem
    An IPlaylist will contain a collection of IPlaylistItem.
    IPlaylistManager
    IPlaylistManager is used to manage playlists in the autodownload feature.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlaylistConfig
    A class to store the resulting settings from a PlaylistConfigBuilder.
    PlaylistConfigBuilder
    A playlist config builder which uses a builder pattern to configure the parameters for a new IPlaylist.
    VirtuosoPlaylistAssetItem
    A response object that is returned from a request to IPlaylistAssetProvider.getAssetParamsForAssetId(String) to indicate if the new asset should be created, skipped or cancelled and provide the AssetParams for creation of the new asset.
